element.short: accepted | declined | tentative | in-process | completed | needs-action
element.definition: Participation status of the participant. When the status is declined or tentative if the start/end times are different to the appointment, then these times should be interpreted as a requested time change. When the status is accepted, the times can either be the time of the appointment (as a confirmation of the time) or can be empty.

binding.description: The Participation status of an appointment.
